comment.body:
@ycngmn

Try

```
empire-stream.net#%#//scriptlet('prevent-xhr', 'pagead2.googlesyndication.com')
empire-stream.net#%#//scriptlet('prevent-addEventListener', 'click', 'open')
empire-stream.net##button.btn-ad-iframe > .link-ad-iframe
```

issue.title: ya.ru
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://ya.ru/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fya.ru%2F) ### Comment > Шаги: > 1. Перейти по ссылке https://ya.ru > 2. Нажать на кнопку «Войти» и авторизоваться в учетной записи Яндекса. > 3. В правом верхнем углу есть кнопка меню авторизованного пользователя > 4. Нажать на аватарку пользователя > > Ожидаемый результат: > Открылся попап профиля пользователя Яндекс ID > > Фактический результат: > Попап профиля пользователя постоянно загружается. > > > --------------------------------------------------------------------- > > > Steps: > 1. Click on the link https://ya.ru > 2. Click on the "Log in" button and log in to your Yandex account. > 3. There is an authorized user menu button in the upper right corner > 4. Click on the user's avatar > > Expected result: > A pop-up of the Yandex ID user profile has opened > > The actual result: > The user profile's popup is constantly being loaded. issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

> I can’t block links or urls YOU identify as advertising anymore. It doesn’t work the way it should and used to.
> 
> Did you take a bite of the Apple?

Do not close AdGuard window ~90 seconds, because iOS will breaks configuration process.

Bumps [lint-staged](https://github.com/okonet/lint-staged) from 15.2.1 to 15.2.2.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/okonet/lint-staged/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/lint-staged/lint-staged/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/okonet/lint-staged/compare/v15.2.1...v15.2.2)

---
updated-dependencies:
- dependency-name: lint-staged
  dependency-type: direct:development
  update-type: version-update:semver-patch
...

Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com>
Co-authored-by: dependabot[bot] <49699333+dependabot[bot]@users.noreply.github.com>

pull_request.title: Bump lint-staged from 15.2.1 to 15.2.2
pull_request.body:
Bumps [lint-staged](https://github.com/okonet/lint-staged) from 15.2.1 to 15.2.2.
Release notes

Sourced from lint-staged's releases.

v15.2.2

Patch Changes

  • #1391 fdcdad4 Thanks @​iiroj! - Lint-staged no longer tries to load configuration from files that are not checked out. This might happen when using sparse-checkout.
Changelog

Sourced from lint-staged's changelog.

15.2.2

Patch Changes

  • #1391 fdcdad4 Thanks @​iiroj! - Lint-staged no longer tries to load configuration from files that are not checked out. This might happen when using sparse-checkout.
Commits
  • 4d4270b chore(changeset): release
  • a7c5957 Merge pull request #1391 from lint-staged/fix-sparse-checkout
  • c1b2a6a ci: use macOS Sonoma M1 runners
  • fdcdad4 fix: do not try to load configuration from files that are not checked out
  • See full diff in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=lint-staged&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=15.2.1&new-version=15.2.2)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

issue.title: Scam sites: startcapitalstructure.com and bestmarketvaluation.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.2.241

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Dangerous site

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://bestmarketvaluation.com/products/princess-dress-for-big-sister-mouse-rose?promoted_link_id=beHHJOmsADW0, https://startcapitalstructure.com/products/woodstock-throw?source_id=vkKMSrKuetYCgBkI

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist, NoCoin Filter List

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Chinese filter, AdGuard Dutch filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Japanese filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Ukrainian filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Both of these websites impersonate a news site (jauns.lv). Every link in these websites lead to one specific section in the page where user have to input their personal data (full name, email, phone), making them very suspicious.

Found these websites in Facebook's "Sponsored" posts, they do not get blocked on my end.

Please block these websites.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

Реклама не повторяется ни на `mail.ru`, ни в яндекс почте. Выше верно сказали насчет включения AdGuard Extra, также обновите фильтры и перед открытием сайтов нужно очистить данные браузера с последующим его перезапуском.

---

Вижу, что вы используете программу - в этом случае расширения блокировщиков рекламы можно удалить из браузера, кроме браузерного помощника.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

comment.body:
> Нет кнопок соцсетей при попытке поделиться любым видео с Ютуб при включённом блокировщике. При отключённом - всё работает

Вы же включили фильтр соц. сетей. Прочтите его описание.

labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

issue.title: Many Hijacked Subdomains
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

_N.B.: Reposting https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardSDNSFilter/issues/572 from 3ya (!) for increased visibility._

According to another in a long-term series of articles, various subdomains of a number of Microsoft-owned domains have been hijacked.

[_Seizing subdomains. How I took over Microsoft subdomains and how to perform such attacks_](https://hackmag.com/security/subdomain-interception/) → https://github.com/EdOverflow/can-i-take-over-xyz has quite a lot of details re:  & especially combatting this.  _Some_ of the problem involves CNAME hacking.

 Hard lists of such seem difficult to find, but https://www.google.com/search?q=hijacked%20microsoft%20domains seems to give more pieces to the puzzle. _(Perhaps whenever DNSSEC is widely deployed this'll no longer be an issue.)_

### Proposed solution

🤷🏾‍♂️  I'm hoping you experts can come up w/ a good solution.

### Additional information

Thanks to @DandelionSprout for reminding me to followup on this.

comment.body:
> @EdelStark Hello. Unfortunately I cannot reproduce the popup tab. Could you try adding this rule to user rules and test this page with it: `yestervid.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-window-open')` Is this browser behavior repeated on other sites?

Update:
After adding this rule to the user rules, the pop up ads doesn't prompt anymore. But let me reproduce it so you can properly check the logs.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

comment.body:

</details>

<details>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/8361299/e670e75b-6f21-4b46-a295-64e3fcb70813)

Same with the app.
Please try to restart a browser.

labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

comment.body:
Не повторяется, фото на месте - мы их не блокируем.
Попробуйте очистить данные браузера, обновить фильтры (подождите около одной минуты), затем откройте сайт.
Если это не поможет, вам следует повторно включить блокировщики контента (веб расширения) в настройках Safari (подождите примерно столько же времени, сколько и при обновлении фильтров).

comment.body:
> @EdelStark Thank you. I was able to reproduce the redirect with the blocker turned off, but with it turned on the ads are blocked. Could you please send screenshots of the filtering log? To do this, go to the 4th tab in AdGuard and click recent activity, then clear the log and repeat the ads again and take screenshots of the filtering log with all site requests. Perhaps the site somehow accidentally got into the allowlist `(2 tab --> AdBlocking --> website allowlist)`

Regarding on the allowlist feature, i don't have any entries on that tab and it was turned off eversince after configuring Adguard on my part.

![Screenshot_2024-02-07-22-06-04-161_com adguard android](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/67328631/e1fe3159-9b17-4573-9d6d-04d7b8a05adf)

When the website loaded for the first time, the webpage suddenly opens an another tab, loading the malicious ad. If you try to load again the website for the second time, the pop up tab will not appear. comment.body:
> @EdelStark Thank you. I was able to reproduce the redirect with the blocker turned off, but with it turned on the ads are blocked. Could you please send screenshots of the filtering log? To do this, go to the 4th tab in AdGuard and click recent activity, then clear the log and repeat the ads again and take screenshots of the filtering log with all site requests. Perhaps the site somehow accidentally got into the allowlist `(2 tab --> AdBlocking --> website allowlist)`

Here's the filtering log screenshots you've asked. I temporarily disable the user rule you've provided to reproduce it. 
![Screenshot_2024-02-07-22-00-34-833_com adguard android](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/67328631/8cb33d66-f15b-41c3-8765-52dceef68fa7)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

AdGuard Browser Extension

4.2.241

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Dangerous site

Firefox, Microsoft Edge

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://bestmarketvaluation.com/products/princess-dress-for-big-sister-mouse-rose?promoted_link_id=beHHJOmsADW0, https://startcapitalstructure.com/products/woodstock-throw?source_id=vkKMSrKuetYCgBkI

### Ad Blocking

### Social Widgets

### Annoyances

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Chinese filter, AdGuard Dutch filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Japanese filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Ukrainian filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Both of these websites impersonate a news site (jauns.lv). Every link in these websites lead to one specific section in the page where user have to input their personal data (full name, email, phone), making them very suspicious.

Found these websites in Facebook's "Sponsored" posts, they do not get blocked on my end.

Please block these websites.

issue.title: Many Hijacked Subdomains
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

_N.B.: Reposting https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardSDNSFilter/issues/572 from 3ya (!) for increased visibility._

According to another in a long-term series of articles, various subdomains of a number of Microsoft-owned domains have been hijacked.

[_Seizing subdomains. How I took over Microsoft subdomains and how to perform such attacks_](https://hackmag.com/security/subdomain-interception/) → https://github.com/EdOverflow/can-i-take-over-xyz has quite a lot of details re:  & especially combatting this.  _Some_ of the problem involves CNAME hacking.

 Hard lists of such seem difficult to find, but https://www.google.com/search?q=hijacked%20microsoft%20domains seems to give more pieces to the puzzle. _(Perhaps whenever DNSSEC is widely deployed this'll no longer be an issue.)_

### Proposed solution

🤷🏾‍♂️  I'm hoping you experts can come up w/ a good solution.

### Additional information

Thanks to @DandelionSprout for reminding me to followup on this.

comment.body: Do you have examples?

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Overlay blocked by generic rule from Base filter for me:
`/?oo=1&aab=1|$script,third-party,xmlhttprequest`

Adserver which is blocked by that rule is also blocked by DNS filter.

@zloyden can you reproduce?

comment.body:
Здравствуйте. У сайта низкая посещаемость, поэтому правила не могут быть добавлены в основные фильтры. Вот правила для пользовательских правил:
```
useron.ru###centertop > div[id]:has(div[id] > div[class] > div[class] > div.bannergroup)
useron.ru###centertop ~ div[id]:has(div[id] > div[class] > div[class] > div.bannergroup)
useron.ru##.yjsquare:has( > .h2_holder + .yjsquare_in > .bannergroup)
```

### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [http://youtube.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fyoutube.com) ### Comment > For the last couple of days I've noticed a significant slowdown in loading Youtube pages with AdGuard enabled. I've updated all filters, but the apparent deliberate slowness does not go away unless I disable AdGuard and then Youtube appears to load correctly. Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard window ~90 seconds, because iOS will breaks configuration process.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.
